Title: 1954 Mozart Piano Concerto No. 14 - Myra Hess, Bruno Walter NY Philharmonic
Description:
Another recording off the radio from the weekly broadcast of the NY Philharmonic. This broadcast from 1954 is introduced by Jim Fassett as Mozart's Piano Concerto No 14 in Eb Major, K. 449. English pianist Dame Myra Hess plays this impressive piece conducted by German conductor Bruno Walter. 

Technical information: 
7" Cine Reel 
Scotch - unknown type of tape
7 1/2 IPS
As typical with these recordings in the archive it gets distorted in the loudest parts but sounds great otherwise. 


00:00 - Intro by Jim Fassett
02:43 - Allegro vivace
10:05 - Andantino
18:49 - Allegro ma non troppo

Title: Brahms:   Symphony no. 2  in D major op. 73   -   Bruno Walter, direttore; New York Philharmonic

IV     Allegro con spirito

Bruno Walter, direttore
New York Philharmonic
New York, 1953

III. Scherzo. Molto vivace (16:30)
IV. Lebhaft (22:07)

Title: Vladimir Horowitz-Walter: Tchaikovsky Piano Concerto No. 1, Op. 23 (1948/New York Philharmonic)
Description:
P. Tchaikovsky
Piano Concerto No. 1 in B flat minor, Op. 23
차이콥스키 피아노 협주곡 1번, 작품번호 23번
...................
00:00 I. Allegro non troppo e molto maestoso
14:20 Cadenza
18:30 II. Andantino simplice
24:46 III. Allegro con fuoco

small part missing in the First Movement, 9:18
...................
piano: Vladimir Horowitz
conductor: Bruno Walter
orchestra: New York Philharmonic
...................
Recording Information:
Radio Broadcast (And Yale Collection)

April 11, 1948
Carnegie Hall, New York City, New York (Live)
...................
In my opinion, this is the best Tchaikovsky Concerto Recording of all time.
